text: its not the wind that keeps you up
its not the snow, its not the moon
coming like a headlight through your window.
its not the thumbnail of a scream
its not the news of burning towns
like a spool you turn, and you turn
no these wars you did not start
they don't tear your sleep apart
and theres nothing you can give her
and theres nothing you wanna keep
you don't even try to prove
that the noise is neighbors making love
share your toast maybe spill some coffee from your cup
oh theres nothing left to choose
and there is so much more to lose
